GSD.product_version: versions from v4.10 to before v5.4.198
GSD.description:
net: ipv6: unexport __init-annotated seg6_hmac_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit 317260b3eb6384a05a8af212308fa50f3b2e8290, it was introduced in version v4.10 by commit bf355b8d2c30a289232042cacc1cfaea4923936c. For more details please see the references link.
